blocks.name: zneoALTV
blocks.content: No even integer equals an odd integer (i.e. no integer can be both even and odd). Exercise 10(a) of [Apostol] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2004.) (Revised by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: zeoALTV
blocks.content: An integer is even or odd. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2006.) (Revised by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: zeo2ALTV
blocks.content: An integer is even or odd but not both. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.) (Revised by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: nneoALTV
blocks.content: A positive integer is even or odd but not both. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2006.) (Revised by AV, 19-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: nneoiALTV
blocks.content: A positive integer is even or odd but not both. (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-2001.) (Revised by AV, 19-Jun-2020.)
